availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Patsy Kidd Vaughn in Wayne County on October 3, 1844. Father of William Vaughn, Elizabeth Vaughn, John S. Vaughan. Laborer in Wayne County in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860. Died of smallpox in Wayne County on January 21, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Division 2, p. 274A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, p. 328.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Wayne County Marriages, Film #000591550, p.60.
KYR-0001-007-0095.
